name: painter_of_void
prompt: An artist paints with black holes as pigment. Write their exhibition description for 'The Color of Nothing'.
decoded: In 'The Color of Nothing', we explore the mysteries of the universe through the lens of black holes. The artist's unique approach to painting with black holes as pigment creates a mesmerizing display of colors and patterns. Join us as we delve into the depths of the cosmos and discover the hidden beauty of nothing.
